con:testCase.name: PAYCTINTOUPNP
con:testCase.con:description: International Payment Normal Priority w/o exchange Out

con:request.name: PaymentCreate
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v1_9" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v1_9" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7" xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v1_7" xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v1_7">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsc:AutHeader>\r <wsc:SourceApplication>${#TestSuite#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication>\r <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication>\r <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function>\r <wsc:Version>V1_9</wsc:Version>\r <wsc:ClientContext>\r <wsc:userid>${#TestSuite#userid}</wsc:userid>\r <wsc:credentials>${#TestSuite#credentials}</wsc:credentials>\r <wsc:channel>NBA</wsc:channel>\r <wsc:orgid>${#TestSuite#orgid}</wsc:orgid>\r <wsc:orgunit>${#TestSuite#orgid}</wsc:orgunit>\r <wsc:customerid>${#TestSuite#customerid}</wsc:customerid>\r <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale>\r <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip>\r <wsc:item value="${#TestSuite#value1}" key="${#TestSuite#item1}"/>\r <wsc:item value="${#TestSuite#value2}" key="${#TestSuite#item2}"/>\r <wsc:item value="${#TestSuite#value3}" key="${#TestSuite#item3}"/>\r <wsc:item value="${#TestSuite#value4}" key="${#TestSuite#item4}"/>\r </wsc:ClientContext>\r </wsc:AutHeader>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <urn:PaymentCreateRequest>\r <urn:paymentMessage>\r <urn1:paymentIdentification>\r <urn2:messageIdentification>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:messageIdentification>\r <urn2:endToEndIdentification>${#TestSuite#endtoendID}</urn2:endToEndIdentification>\r <!--Optional:-->\r </urn1:paymentIdentification>\r <urn1:paymentInfo>\r <urn3:paymentMethod>TRF</urn3:paymentMethod>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn3:paymentTypeInformation>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn3:instructionPriority>NORM</urn3:instructionPriority>\r </urn3:paymentTypeInformation>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <urn3:requestedExecutionDate>${#TestSuite#ReqExnDate}</urn3:requestedExecutionDate>\r <urn3:debtorAccount>\r <urn2:identification>${#TestSuite#debitAccountEUR}</urn2:identification>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn2:currency>${#TestSuite#debitAccountEurCCY}</urn2:currency>\r </urn3:debtorAccount>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r </urn1:paymentInfo>\r <urn1:transaction>\r <urn4:amount>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <urn2:instructedAmount currency="EUR">\r <urn2:amount>1</urn2:amount>\r </urn2:instructedAmount>\r </urn4:amount>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn4:chargeBearer>DEBT</urn4:chargeBearer>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn4:creditorAgent>\r <urn2:bic>${#TestSuite#intCredAgentBic}</urn2:bic>\r <urn2:postalAddress>\r <urn2:country>${#TestSuite#intCredAgentCountry}</urn2:country>\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r </urn4:creditorAgent>\r <urn4:creditor>\r <urn2:name>CreditorInt</urn2:name>\r <urn2:postalAddress>\r <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType>\r <urn2:streetName>streetName</urn2:streetName>\r <urn2:postCode>1234</urn2:postCode>\r <urn2:townName>townName</urn2:townName>\r <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country>\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r </urn4:creditor>\r <urn4:creditorAccount>\r <urn2:identification>${#TestSuite#intCreditAccount}</urn2:identification>\r <!--Optional:-->\r </urn4:creditorAccount>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r </urn1:transaction>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r </urn:paymentMessage>\r </urn:PaymentCreateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: PaymentConfirm
